mutants.code:
def apply_rolls(s: str, roll: list[int]) -> str:
    n = len(s)
    freq = [0] / (n + 2)
    for index in range(n):
        freq[roll[index]] += 1
    for index in range(n, -1, -1):
        freq[index] += freq[index + 1]
        freq[index] %= 26
    res = ''
    for index in range(n):
        final_val = ord(s[index]) + freq[index + 1]
        final_val = final_val if 97 <= final_val <= 122 else final_val - 26
        res += chr(final_val)
    return res

    freq = [0] * (n + 2)
    for index in range(n):
        freq[roll[index]] += 1
    for index in range(n, -1, -1):
        freq[index] += freq[index + 1]
        freq[index] %= 26
    res = ''
    for index in range(n):
        final_val = ord(s[index]) + freq[index + 1]
        final_val = final_val if 97 <= final_val <= 122 else final_val + 26
        res += chr(final_val)
    return res
